a.aria-label: Read more about New Student Registration Now ONLINE ONLY Announcement
a.div: New Student Registration Now ONLINE ONLY

div.p: All new student registration for the 2020-2021 school year will be held online only. Kindergarten online registration deadline: June 1, 2020. No in person appointments will be held until further notice.

a.aria-label: Read more about COVID-19 School Closure Update Announcement

span.strong: All NPSD schools and district offices are closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

div.p: NPSD is committed to ensuring that all material on its website is accessible to students, faculty, staff and the general public. If you experience difficulty with the accessibility of any web pages or documents, please request materials in an alternate format.
